alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 03 at 2:41PM CST until February 04 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 24 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Calhoun and Coastal Refugio Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Friday. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Freeze Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
